block.description: The namespace and ID of the block that this block needs to be to pass the check.
block.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the block that this block needs to be to pass the check.

type.description:
## Block --- [Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block) Checks whether the block is a certain block (by ID). Type ID: `origins:block` --- ### Examples ```json "block_condition": { "type": "origins:block", "block": "minecraft:diamond_block" } ``` This example checks if the block is a Diamond Block.
```json "block_condition": { "type": "origins:or", "conditions": [ { "type": "origins:block", "block": "minecraft:diamond_block" }, { "type": "origins:block", "block": "minecraft:emerald_block" } ] } ``` This example will check if the block is either a Diamond Block or an Emerald Block.
type.markdownDescription:
undefined## Block --- [Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block) Checks whether the block is a certain block (by ID). Type ID: `origins:block` --- ### Examples ```json "block_condition": { "type": "origins:block", "block": "minecraft:diamond_block" } ``` This example checks if the block is a Diamond Block.
```json "block_condition": { "type": "origins:or", "conditions": [ { "type": "origins:block", "block": "minecraft:diamond_block" }, { "type": "origins:block", "block": "minecraft:emerald_block" } ] } ``` This example will check if the block is either a Diamond Block or an Emerald Block.
